name: Catch-a-Trooper
overview: Survival! Fight between land, sky and sea with Catch-a-Trooper. You will experience at home, all the charm of a real training with various difficult tests of skill, courage and endurance. So if you feel ready to be the solitary hero of an unbelievable, committed and active adventure start now. During the game throw the nets to survive. If you make it long enough you will have managed to take a well-deserved rest in the beautiful islands of a remote atoll in the Pacific. Relax and calm down, you are on board a small boat in the hope of catching the biggest of fish, falling from the sky. Then move on to take out the advancing soldiers. Help soldiers who fall from the transport helicopter avoid the voracious shark and flying birds of prey.
